languages.text: "Тактически невыгодно — на "Бессердечном" еще есть враги, они будут прорываться к мостику. У лифта надо организовать оборону, или нам ударят в спину".
"This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
languages.original_text: "Тактически невыгодно — на "Бессердечном" еще есть враги, они будут прорываться к мостику. У лифта надо организовать оборону, или нам ударят в спину".

traits.locale_text: "This puts us at a tactical disadvantage. The 'Heartless' is full of hostiles who will try and storm the bridge. We have to set up a defense at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
"This puts us at a tactical disadvantage. The 'Heartless' is full of hostiles who will try and storm the bridge. We have to set up a defense at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
"This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The 'Heartless' is full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
"This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The 'Heartless' is full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
"This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."
"This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

languages.text: «Eso supondría una desventaja táctica. La Desalmada sigue llena de enemigos que intentarán asaltar el puente. Es necesario establecer una línea de defensa en el ascensor para evitar que nos disparen por la espalda».
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: «Eso supondría una desventaja táctica. La Desalmada sigue llena de enemigos que intentarán asaltar el puente. Es necesario establecer una línea de defensa en el ascensor para evitar que nos disparen por la espalda».

languages.text: “这么做会让在战术上陷入劣势。无心号依然到处都是敌人，他们会朝舰桥一拥而上。我们必须设置好防线，以防敌人从背后包抄。”
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: “这么做会让在战术上陷入劣势。无心号依然到处都是敌人，他们会朝舰桥一拥而上。我们必须设置好防线，以防敌人从背后包抄。”

languages.text: 「これは戦略的な不利になるでしょう。ハートレスは、まだブリッジを襲撃しようとする敵でいっぱいです。私たちはエレベーターで防衛を開始し、背後を撃たれないようにしなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: 「これは戦略的な不利になるでしょう。ハートレスは、まだブリッジを襲撃しようとする敵でいっぱいです。私たちはエレベーターで防衛を開始し、背後を撃たれないようにしなければなりません」

languages.text: "Dadurch wären wir taktisch im Nachteil. Die Heartless ist immer noch voller Feinde, die versuchen werden, die Brücke zu stürmen. Wir müssen am Aufzug eine Verteidigung einrichten, damit sie uns nicht in den Rücken fallen."
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Dadurch wären wir taktisch im Nachteil. Die Heartless ist immer noch voller Feinde, die versuchen werden, die Brücke zu stürmen. Wir müssen am Aufzug eine Verteidigung einrichten, damit sie uns nicht in den Rücken fallen."

languages.text: « Stratégiquement parlant, ce serait une erreur. Le Sans-Cœur est encore plein d'ennemis qui ne manqueront pas de prendre d'assaut la passerelle. Nous devons à tout prix installer une ligne défensive au niveau de l'ascenseur pour les empêcher de nous prendre à revers. »
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: « Stratégiquement parlant, ce serait une erreur. Le Sans-Cœur est encore plein d'ennemis qui ne manqueront pas de prendre d'assaut la passerelle. Nous devons à tout prix installer une ligne défensive au niveau de l'ascenseur pour les empêcher de nous prendre à revers. »

languages.text: "Öyle yaparsak taktiksel avantajımızı yitiririz. Taşkalp, köprüye girip bizi sıkıştırabilecek düşmanlarla dolu. İki yandan kuşatılmamak için asansörün önünde bir savunma mevzisi kurmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "This will put us at a tactical disadvantage. The Heartless is still full of hostiles who will try to storm the bridge. We have to set up a defence at the elevator to avoid being shot in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle yaparsak taktiksel avantajımızı yitiririz. Taşkalp, köprüye girip bizi sıkıştırabilecek düşmanlarla dolu. İki yandan kuşatılmamak için asansörün önünde bir savunma mevzisi kurmalıyız."
